property.name: Text
property.value: crew Attachment · Swordsman Knack (A crew may only attach a number of Swordsman Knacks up to their Swordsman bonus.) React: Tack Aldana School immediately before this crew plays a card during a Boarding Attack. Draw three cards. Place one of these cards in your hand, then discard the others.

property.name: Text
property.value: Gunner · Villainous

property.name: Text
property.value: React: Play when you are suffering Hits during a Boarding Attack. Tack one of your Heroic crew to absorb Hits equal to twice his or her Swashbuckling.

property.name: Text
property.value: crew Attachment · Swordsman Knack (A crew may only attach a number of Swordsman Knacks up to their Swordsman bonus.) React: Tack Ambrogia School to draw a card after this crew plays a Boarding Attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target and discard one non-Artifact Adventure that hasn't been completed. This card's cost is reduced by 2 if you have a Sea Dog Captain.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: Tack Bjorn immediately after you complete a Goods Adventure to draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: 3 Seas Away To complete: Tack 5 Adventuring (4 if completed in Trade Sea). crew Attachment: +5 Sailing

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your Brotherhood crew gains +2 Cannon until the end of the turn. That crew gains +2 extra Cannon if there is a Montaigne Ship in play (+4 total).

property.name: Text
property.value: You may only play this card if you have a Heroic Captain. Discard three cards from your hand to name a skill. All of your crew gain +1 to that skill until the end of the turn. You only have to discard one card if you have a Gosse Captain.

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your Castille crew gains Sailing equal to your Ship's move cost until the end of the turn. That crew gains additional Sailing equal to your Ship's move cost if there is an Explorer Ship in play (total equal to twice your move cost).

property.name: Text
property.value: Corsairs Captain Attachment · Letter of Marque · Unique You must tack your Captain to put this card into play. React: Tack the Code and one of your crew when you are paying a Sailing cost. That crew produces Sailing equal to your Ship's move cost.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sea Attachment Any player in this Sea may sink Common Pier by tacking 4 Cannon as an action. Act: Tack Common Pier and target an opposing Ship in this Sea if your Ship is in this Sea. Your Ship begins a Boarding with that Ship. This Boarding cannot be canceled without a card effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: Captain Attachment The cost to play this card is reduced to zero if you have a Castillian Captain. React: Discard Cool Castillian Blood when one of your Action cards has been canceled. The canceled card is put into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your Corsairs crew gains +2 Adventuring until the end of the turn. That crew gains +2 extra Adventuring if there is a Gosse Ship in play (+4 total).

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your Crimson Roger crew gains +2 Adventuring until the end of the turn. That crew gains +2 extra Adventuring if there is a Sea Dog Ship in play (+4 total).

property.name: Text
property.value: 2 Seas Away To complete: Tack 4 Adventuring (3 if completed in la Boca). crew Attachment: +4 Cannon

property.name: Text
property.value: Target an Illegal card. Discard that card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Swordsman +1 (Dalia inflicts 1 extra Hit during Boarding Attacks) Draw one card immediately after Dalia plays a Slash attack during a Boarding Attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target your Ship and one other Ship. Inflict Hits to the other player's Ship equal to that Ship's move cost. Then, inflict Hits to your Ship equal to your Ship's move cost.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: Play when one of your Swordsman crew inflicts Hits during a Boarding Attack. Your crew inflicts Hits equal to your crew's Swashbuckling, but cannot receive any bonuses. The opposing player may not tack crew to absorb these Hits.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target one Sea Attachment in this Sea. Discard that Sea Attachment. This card's cost is reduced to zero if you have a Corsairs Captain.

property.value: crew Attachment · Swordsman Knack (A crew may only attach a number of Swordsman Knacks up to their Swordsman bonus.) React: Tack Donovan School to draw two cards after this crew plays a Slash Boarding Attack.

property.value: 1 Sea Away To complete: Tack 2 Adventuring (1 if completed in Trade Sea). crew Attachment: +2 Adventuring

property.name: Text
property.value: React: Instead of performing a Boarding Attack, target one crew on the other Ship in the Boarding. Tack that crew.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Dunti inflicts Hits with a Boarding Attack, you may discard 2 cards from your hand to inflict 3 extra Hits, once per Boarding Attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: crew Attachment · Swordsman Knack (A crew may only attach a number of Swordsman Knacks up to their Swordsman bonus.) React: Tack Eisenfaust School to draw two cards after this crew plays a Punch Boarding Attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you are putting Espera into play from your hand, his Influence cost is zero if you have Dalia on your Ship.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: Play when you are tacking a crew to pay a cost and that crew has one or more completed adventures attached. The crew produces 1 extra point of the skill. That crew produces 1 additional point (2 total) if you have a Brotherhood Captain.

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your Explorer crew gains +1 Cannon and +1 Swashbuckling until the end of the turn. That crew gains +1 extra Cannon and +1 extra Swashbuckling if there is a Castille Ship in play (+2 total each).

property.value: 2 Seas Away To complete: Tack 5 Adventuring (4 if completed in The Mirror). crew Attachment: +2 Swashbuckling. This crew inflicts 2 extra Hits during Boarding Attacks.

property.value: Untack one of your First Mates.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target a Ship in play. Inflict 1 Hit on the target for every completed Adventure on the target Ship.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forbidden Sea Attachment Unique · Patron Any player may sink Villanova by tacking 4 Influence as an action. All of your Villainous crew inflict 1 extra Hit during Boarding Attacks.

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your Gosse crew gains +2 Influence until the end of the turn. That crew gains +2 extra Influence if there is a Corsairs Ship in play (+4 total).

property.name: Text
property.value: React: Play when tacking a Gunner to produce Cannon. That crew produces 2 extra Cannon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique · Loyal · No attachments React: Instead of performing a Boarding Attack, tack Hamish to inflict 5 Hits on the other Ship in the Boarding. Then you suffer 3 Hits. Hamish cannot tack or sink to absorb these 3 Hits.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may only play this card if you have a Heroic Captain. Target another player. The next time that player pays a Sailing cost, this card produces 4 Sailing for that player, then attaches to one of your crew, giving +2 Adventuring.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target an Item card in play. Discard that card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique React: Tack Imshi when you tack the Artifact Cannon. Imshi adds his Cannon skill to the Hits inflicted by the Artifact Cannon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target a crew with a Face, Eye, Leg, or Hand Attachment. Tack that crew.

property.name: Text
property.value: Captain Attachment React: Discard Jean Marie when a player performs an action which discards or sinks one of their own crew. The other effects of that action are negated.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Explorer's Society

property.name: Text
property.value: When Joseph tacks to absorb Hits, except during Boarding, you may discard one card from your hand to absorb 3 extra Hits. You may only use this ability once each time you suffer Hits.

property.name: Text
property.value: Corsairs Captain Attachment · Unique · Patron This card does not untack during the Untack phase. React: Tack Kalem when you are paying an Influence cost to produce 3 Influence. React: Untack Kalem when another player's crew is sunk.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: Target a Ship when it enters this Sea. You may immediately perform a Cannon Attack against that Ship.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target a crew. Until the end of the turn, that crew's Cannon skill is always zero.

property.name: Text
property.value: 1 Sea Away To Complete: Tack 2 Adventuring (1 if completed in la Boca). crew Attachment: May not be attached to a Villainous crew. This crew gains the Heroic trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: Play immediately after you tack crew to absorb Hits, except during Boarding. Untack one of your crew which tacked to absorb Hits.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Gosse's Gentlemen

property.name: Text
property.value: All Goods adventures attached to Martin which produce Influence, produce 1 extra Influence.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target another player's uncompleted Adventure. Move that Adventure to any Sea. This card's cost is reduced to zero if you have an Explorers Captain.

property.value: Gosse's Gentlemen

property.name: Text
property.value: Loyal · Unique · Heroic · Swordsman +2 (Melinda inflicts 2 extra Hits during Boarding Attacks) React: Tack Melinda when you are putting Andre Braudel into play from your hand to reduce his Influence cost by 5.

property.name: Text
property.value: Heroic · Swordsman +1 (Miguel inflicts 1 extra Hit during Boarding Attacks) Miguel inflicts 2 extra Hits during a Boarding Attack when the opposing Captain is Villainous.

property.name: Text
property.value: Rower · Captive Mike may not be placed on a Heroic Captain's Ship. Discard Mike at the end of the Action phase if he is untacked.

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your Montaigne crew gains +2 Swashbuckling until the end of the turn. That crew gains +2 extra Swashbuckling if there is a Brotherhood Ship in play (+4 total).

property.name: Text
property.value: This Sea Attachment · Unique · Patron You may only play this card if you have a Gosse Captain. Any player in this Sea may sink Old Flame by tacking 4 Swashbuckling as an action. While Old Flame is in play, other players may not attach Attachment cards to this Sea. Cards already attached are unaffected.

property.value: 1 Sea Away To Complete: Tack 3 Adventuring (2 if completed in Forbidden Sea). crew Attachment: +2 Influence

property.name: Text
property.value: Target another Ship in this Sea. Tack 3 Cannon plus your Ship's move cost to inflict a 3 Hit Cannon Attack on that Ship. Immediately after this Cannon Attack is resolved, move your Ship to an adjacent Sea.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target one Sea. Discard all Sea attachments in that Sea. This does not affect uncompleted adventures.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ship Attachment Act: Target a Ship in this Sea. Tack the Ramming Spike and pay your Ship's move cost in Sailing to inflict Hits on that Ship equal to your Ship's move cost. The target may pay their Ship's move cost in Sailing to cancel this action.

property.name: Text
property.value: This Sea Attachment Any player in this Sea may sink this card by tacking 2 Influence as an action. Act: Tack Retired Smuggler to get one Item card from your discard pile and move it to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ship Attachment · Unique This card may only be attached to ships with a move cost less than 3. While Rigged for Speed is attached to your Ship, you have +8 Sailing for the purposes of determining Initiative.

property.name: Text
property.value: crew Attachment · Swordsman Knack (A crew may only attach a number of Swordsman Knacks up to their Swordsman bonus.) React: Tack Rogers School when this crew inflicts Hits with a Boarding Attack. This attack inflicts 3 extra Hits.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: Play when one of your crew inflicts Hits with a Boarding Attack. The Boarding Attack inflicts 2 extra Hits.

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your Sea Dog crew gains +2 Swashbuckling until the end of the turn. That crew gains +2 extra Swashbuckling if there is a Crimson Roger Ship in play (+4 total).

property.name: Text
property.value: React: Play when tacking a Topman to produce Sailing. That crew produces extra Sailing equal to your Ship's move cost.

property.value: Sea Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: Sam may not be placed on a Villainous Captain's Ship. Sam has +2 Swashbuckling while there is a Villainous Captain in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique · Loyal · Villainous Act: Discard one of your crew to draw one card. This can be done once per turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target another Ship in this Sea. Until the end of this turn, your Cannon Attacks targeting that Ship each inflict 2 extra Hits if your Ship has a lower move cost.

property.name: Text
property.value: Adventure Attachment This can only be attached to another player's uncompleted Adventure, and only if you have a Heroic Captain. The cost to complete this Adventure is reduced by 2 (minimum 0). Once the Adventure is completed, Shore Knowledge attaches to one of your crew, giving +2 Influence.

property.value: React: Tack Thomas when another Ship enters your Sea to untack one of your crew, except the Captain.

property.name: Text
property.value: Tack all cards in play with the Fate trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach one of your Item or Artifact crew attachments in play to a different crew on board your Ship.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may only play this card if you have a Heroic Captain. Target another player. The next time that player pays an Influence cost, this card produces 2 Influence for that player, then attaches to your Captain. This Attachment may be discarded when you are paying an Influence cost to produce 4 Influence.

property.name: Text
property.value: No attachments · Unique Tyree may not be put into play if you already have a First Mate in play. React: Tack and discard Tyree when you put a First Mate into play from your hand to reduce the crew's cost by 8 (minimum 0).

property.name: Text
property.value: Gosse Captain Attachment · Letter of Marque · Unique You may not put this card into play if any other player has more Heroic crew in play than you. Act: Sink the Unwritten Rules, and get any card from your deck, show it to your opponents, and put it in your hand. Shuffle your deck. Every man knows them, and none need reminding.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target a Ship in this Sea. That Ship suffers 1 Hit for each untacked Villainous crew card on board plus 2 Hits for each untacked Captive crew card on board.

property.name: Text
property.value: 1 Sea Away To complete: Tack 6 Adventuring (4 if completed in The Mirror). crew Attachment: +3 Influence

property.name: Text
property.value: crew Attachment · Swordsman Knack (A crew may only attach a number of Swordsman Knacks up to their Swordsman bonus.) React: Tack Valroux School to draw two cards after this crew plays a Thrust Boarding Attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target a Ship in la Boca. Move that Ship to either Frothing Sea or Forbidden Sea.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may not play this card if you have a Heroic Captain. React: Play when one of your actions is canceled. Discard one of your crew cards that tacked to pay for the action to attach this card to your Captain. This Attachment gives +2 Influence.

property.name: Text
property.value: This Sea Attachment Any player in this Sea may sink Warship by tacking 6 Cannon as an action. Act: Tack Warship to attach it to a Sea adjacent to this Sea. Act: Tack Warship to target a Ship in this Sea. Warship inflicts a 4 Hit Cannon Attack on that Ship.

property.name: Text
property.value: Target a Ship. Inflict 4 Hits to that Ship.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ship Attachment The Armory counts as one crew against your crew maximum. Your Boarding Attacks inflict 1 extra Hit.

property.name: Text
property.value: React: Play when the other player in a Boarding tacks a crew to absorb Hits. The number of Hits absorbed is reduced to zero. The cost to play this card is reduced to zero if you have a Crimson Roger Captain.
